definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: This paper introduces the pragmatic approaches to bridging assumptions, the Result and Reason interpretations of bridging.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了語用照應的推想方法和語用照應因果論。

sentences.english: Yet,my body is alive; that's the whole stipulation.
sentences.chinese: 但我的肉體又活着，整個推想就是這樣。

sentences.english: Acupuncture anesthesia and acupuncture analgesia has promoted the acupuncture therapy to the world.
sentences.chinese: 鍼灸麻醉和鍼灸止痛將鍼灸療法推想了世界。

sentences.english: Does she have the imagination to figure out what happened?
sentences.chinese: 她真的富有想像力，能夠推想出發生的事情嗎？

sentences.english: With one hand now always locked onto the handrail, I bemoaned and laughed about my predicament a little more.
sentences.chinese: 一隻手一直抓着欄杆，我邊嘆氣邊暗笑自己的推想。

sentences.english: The logical and expected choice would be the former.
sentences.chinese: 按照一般的邏輯和推想，人們選擇的一定是前者。

sentences.english: Speculation has ranged from a hippopotamus to a dinosaur.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個從河馬到恐龍的推想。

sentences.english: Besides, you're not supposed to give money to panhandlers.
sentences.chinese: 此外，你沒被推想把錢給乞丐。

sentences.english: On the basis of the approaches mentioned in this paper, the author discusses how relevance theory is used to analyze bridging reference.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了語用照應的推想方法和語用照應因果論。

sentences.english: I thought I might be opposite San Vito .
sentences.chinese: 我推想我也許正在聖維多的對岸。

definition: to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
to make a definitive judgment/to come to a firm conclusion
the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
